title: Great reunion!
description: I really enjoyed getting to see everyone at the reunion last weekend!  The kids are all really growing up fast. Thank you everyone for helping with the food and clean up afterwards.  Let's start an event to start playing a weekly round of disc golf.

title: 50th Anniversary pictures?
description: You know how un-savvy Mom and Dad are about tech so I am putting together an album of all the pictures we took for their 50 Anniversary... I have all of the ones that the photographer took and my candid shots. If anyone took other pics please post them in gallery so I can include them.

title: Spare high chair?
description: Does anyone have a high chair they would be willing to loan?  Allison is ready to try some solid foods!!!

title: Let's fish
description: Ted, are we still on to head to the lake this weekend?

title: RE: Let's fish
description: Heck yeah! I will have the gear loaded, the boat hitched and be to your house by about 5:30 Sat morning.

title: RE: RE: Let's fish
description: WOOOOO! that was an awesome day on the lake. check out the gallery for photo proof of the whoppers we got.

title: Grandpa's dentures
description: Ok... I shouldn't have to be asking this but did anyone happen to move Grandpa's dentures in the past few days? He doesn't remember how long it has been since he had them in. Pls call if you have seen them!!!!

title: Netflix recommendation
description: You all know how much I enjoy (obsess over) animated series and are (generally) pretty tolerant with my long, loving descriptions. You are kind to always smile and say that you will give my latest fave a try. BUT YOU GOTTA DROP EVERYTHING AND WATCH BLUE EYE SAMURAI ON NETFLIX!! Definitely NOT for the kiddos but is a bona-fide masterpiece. Artwork, plot, characters, voice acting, action sequences! Don't walk... RUN to your favorite easy chair and settle in for the ride of your life. This is an all-in production that you will want to immediately watch again and then be all a-twitter waiting for the next season to come out.

title: Monkey in the drive through
description: LOL Evie was working the window at McD's last night and a guy came through with his pet monkey.  Said he even got the monkey it's own small fries

title: yard work help
description: Mom and I are looking for some help in the yard next weekend (Apr 14th). Nothing too strenuous... just some basic spring cleaning. I will be smoking some brisket!!! Please let me know.

title: RE: Grandpa's dentures
description: Never mind! They were in the fridge freezer of all places. Maybe it is time to think about alternate living arrangements...?
